version_description:
• Foraged and ate plenty of bugs.
• Brushed fur to reveal a prettier user interface.
• Bear now trained to block custom fonts. Good bear.
• Block lists now updating automagically OTA.
• Safari whitelist extension now an action extension.
• Help feed your bear with an added extension to report bug sightings.
• 135% blockier bears.

• Better whitelist handling, adds subdomains automatically. Fixes sites like idownloadblog.com
• Minor UI bug fixes

• Minor tick and bug removal
• 1.02% more bear puns

-Your Bear has learned the force… touch controls
-Bear witness to an improved Blocklist
-Diligent removal of ticks and bugs from Bear fur
-11% more Bears

• BlockBear is now feeling at home on iPhone X
• Chased away a few pesky bugs

This app has been updated by Apple to use the latest Apple signing certificate.

• Fixed an embearassing bug that caused BlockBear to ask you to download block list updates, even when none were available.

This app has been updated by Apple to use the latest Apple signing certificate.

• Fixed an embearassing bug that caused BlockBear to ask you to download block list updates, even when none were available.
